trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption" /> 信息的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute should only be used as dependency property option.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只应用作依赖项属性选项。

trans-unit.source: Attributes are ignored if declared on a .NET property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 .NET 属性上声明，则将忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute> is intended to be used on Meta-properties only.
It will be ignored for instance properties.
trans-unit.target: 对于实例属性，它将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Activity Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/974353d4-28f9-4202-890d-b36981876148) for more details.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用活动属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/974353d4-28f9-4202-890d-b36981876148)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute> is not specified, the behavior defaults to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption.Optional?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute>，则该行为将默认为 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption.Optional?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The required <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption" /> enumeration value for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例的所需 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute" /> class, with a value for <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute.ValidationOption" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute" /> 的值初始化 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute.ValidationOption" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption" /> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此实例关联的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption" /> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 与此实例关联的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOption" /> 值。
